title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When saving a file using the Save As feature, the file is being saved with a generic file extension and the icon of the file has changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
EB: The file is for all intents and purposes now a generic file, as opening it will prove. The file is opened as text.
SR:
1. Open a file that has a specific file extension (e.g., .java)
2. Click on the Save As option
3. Choose a new location and provide a new name for the file
4. Check the saved file's extension and the icon to confirm they match the original file
